ygData.subject: Re: Lover or Brother?

::Zardus::

Zardus looks at Orchestra and Composer, seeing the reaction to each other.

"I'm assuming you're already familiar with one another?" he inquires, wondering what was going on.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Abyssian Badass" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> ::Orchestra/Composer::
> 
> Orchestra's memory circuit tweaked a little, and he now noticed how stupid he sounded by forgetting that they already had an alliance with the Alliance.
> 
> "Anyway, I need to know if the Alliance is willing to confirm staying at peace, err, just a minute," Orchestra said, then noticed a spot on his armor.
> 
> Orchestra got out a little rag and polished it.  Just then Composer stepped in, holding his weapon just in case.  Orchestra had finished polishing, then looked up.  He froze.  Composer froze.  Orchestra dropped the rag without thinking.  Composer dropped his gun without thinking.  They stared at each other for a few moments.  Orchestra stood up, then stepped forward.  Composer stepped forward.  They walked up to each other, then stood toe to toe.  They gazed into each other's optics.
> 
> "Oh my god," both of them each whispered at the same time...
> 
> 
> 
> ~Abyssian By Birth~
> ~Badass By Choice~
